SEARCH
Package com.bschoolland.models

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
com.bschoolland.models.SalableProduct
com.bschoolland.models.Weapon
public class Weapon extends SalableProduct
Represents a weapon product available in the arena store. Weapons extend SalableProduct and add a damage attribute that indicates how much damage the weapon deals in combat.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Benjamin Schoolland

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, String description, double price, int quantity, int damage)
      Constructs a new Weapon with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the weapon
      description - a brief description of the weapon
      price - the price in gold coins
      quantity - the quantity available in inventory
      damage - the damage dealt per hit
